name: MSMessagesAppPresentationStyle
desc: Presentation styles that describe your iMessage app’s appearance.

items.name: case compact
items.desc: The iMessage App is displayed inside the keyboard area.

items.name: case expanded
items.desc: The iMessage App expands to fill most of the screen.

items.name: case transcript
items.desc: The iMessage app is displayed in the Messages app’s transcript or input field.
